entry.title: Thursday: Chance of flurries. High minus 11. POP 30%
entry.summary: Cloudy with 30 percent chance of flurries early this morning then a mix of sun and cloud. Wind northeast 20 km/h gusting to 40. High minus 11. Wind chill near minus 23. Forecast issued 05:00 AM MST Thursday 26 January 2023

entry.title: Thursday night: Snow. Low minus 17.
entry.summary: Becoming cloudy this evening then snow. Amount 2 cm. Wind northeast 20 km/h gusting to 40 becoming light this evening. Low minus 17. Wind chill near minus 25. Forecast issued 05:00 AM MST Thursday 26 January 2023

entry.title: Friday: Periods of snow. Temperature falling to minus 22 in the afternoon.
entry.summary: Periods of snow ending near noon then clearing. Local amount 2 cm. Wind up to 15 km/h. Temperature falling to minus 22 in the afternoon. Wind chill minus 21 in the morning and minus 28 in the afternoon. Risk of frostbite. Forecast issued 05:00 AM MST Thursday 26 January 2023
